S133B.BALLOT.  X. BALLOT NUMBER GENERATED BY ROPER CENTER.
S133B.BALLOT.  0 1. FORM A 2019 2. FORM B

S133B.Q1. WHAT IS YOUR ARMY RANK OR GRAD?  01. PRIVATE 02. PRIVATE FIRST CLASS 03. TECHNICIAN 5TH GRADE 04. CORPORAL 05. TECHNICIAN 4TH GRADE 06. SERGEANT 07. TECHNICIAN 3RD GRADE 08. STAFF SERGEANT 09. TECHNICAL SERGEANT 10. MASTER SERGEANT OR FIRST SERGEANT 00. NO ANSWER
S133B.Q2. HOW OLD WERE YOU ON YOUR LAST BIRTHDA?  01. 18 YEARS OR YOUNGER 02. 19 YEARS 03. 20 04. 21 05. 22 06. 23 07. 24 08. 25 09. 26-29 YEARS 10. 30-34 YEARS 11. 35 YEARS AND OVER 00. NO ANSWER

S133B.Q3. HOW FAR DID YOU GO IN SCHOO?  1. LESS THAN 6TH GRADE 2. FINISHED 6TH GRADE 3. FINISHED 7TH GRADE 4. FINISHED 8TH GRADE 5. SOME HIGH SCHOOL BUT DID NOT FINISH 6. GRADUATED FROM HIGH SCHOOL (BUSINESS COLLEGE) 7. SOME COLLEGE BUT DID NOT FINISH (JUNIOR COLLEGE) 8. GRADUATED FROM COLLEGE 9. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S133B.Q4. ARE YOU:  1. SINGLE 2. MARRIED 3. DIVORCED OR SEPARATED 4. WIDOWED 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S133B.Q5. HOW DID YOU COME INTO THE ARM?  1. I WAS DRAFTED 2. I VOLUNTEERED 3. I WAS IN THE NATIONAL GUARD 4. OTHER (ENLISTED RESERVE CORPS, REGULAR ARMY RESERVE, RESERVE OFFICER TRAINING CORPS, ETC.) 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S133B.Q6. HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN IN THE ARM? E. IF YOU HAVE BEEN IN THE ARMY BEFORE, THEN WERE OUT FOR A WHILE, JUST CHECK THE LENGTH OF TIME SINCE YOU ENTERED THIS LAST TIME. IF YOU WERE IN THE NATIONAL GUARD, CHECK THE LENGTH OF TIME SINCE YOUR OUTFIT CAME INTO THE ARMY.  1. 3 MONTHS OR LESS 2. OVER 3 MONTHS UP TO 6 MONTHS 3. OVER 6 MONTHS UP TO 9 MONTHS 4. OVER 9 MONTHS UP TO 1 YEAR 5. OVER 1 YEAR UP TO 2 YEARS 6. OVER 2 YEARS UP TO 3 YEARS 7. OVER 3 YEARS 0. NO ANSWER

S133B.Q7. HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN STATIONED IN ALASKA IN THE ARM?  1. 3 MONTHS OR LESS 2. OVER 3 MONTHS UP TO 6 MONTHS 3. OVER 6 MONTHS UP TO 9 MONTHS 4. OVER 9 MONTHS UP TO 1 YEAR 5. OVER 1 YEAR UP TO 2 YEARS 6. OVER 2 YEARS UP TO 3 YEARS 7. OVER 3 YEARS 0. NO ANSWER

S133B.Q8. HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN STATIONED AT YOUR PRESENT POST OR CAMP IN ALASK?  1. 3 MONTHS OR LESS 2. OVER 3 MONTHS UP TO 6 MONTHS 3. OVER 6 MONTHS UP TO 9 MONTHS 4. OVER 9 MONTHS UP TO 1 YEAR 5. OVER 1 YEAR UP TO 2 YEARS 6. OVER 2 YEARS UP TO 3 YEARS 7. OVER 3 YEARS 0. NO ANSWER

S133B.Q9. IN WHAT STATE OR TERRITORY OF THE UNITED STATES DID YOU SPEND MOST OF THE LAST FIVE YEARS OF YOUR CIVILIAN LIFE BEFORE YOU CAME INTO THE ARM?  1. EAST (CONNECTICUT, MAINE, MASSACHUSETTS, NEW HAMPSHIRE, NEW JERSEY, NEW YORK, PENNSYLVANIA, RHODE ISLAND, VERMONT) 2. SOUTH (ALABAMA, ARKANSAS, DELAWARE, DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA, FLORIDA, GEORGIA, KENTUCKY, LOUISIANA, MARYLAND, MISSISSIPPI, NORTH CAROLINA, OKLAHOMA, SOUTH CAROLINA, TENNESSEE, TEXAS, VIRGINIA, WEST VIRGINIA) 3. MIDDLE WEST (ILLINOIS, INDIANA, IOWA, KANSAS, MICHIGAN, MINNESOTA, MISSOURI, NEBRASKA, NORTH DAKOTA, OHIO, SOUTH DAKOTA, WISCONSIN) 4. WEST (ARIZONA, CALIFORNIA, COLORADO, IDAHO, MONTANA, NEVADA, NEW MEXICO, OREGON, UTAH, WASHINGTON, WYOMING) 5. ALASKA 6. ALL OTHERS (FOREIGN, OTHER U.S. POSSESSIONS, OR U.S. NOT SPECIFIED) 0. NO ANSWER

S133B.Q10. WHERE WERE YOU LIVING MOST OF THE LAST FIVE YEARS OF YOUR CIVILIAN LIFE BEFORE YOU CAME INTO THE ARM?  1. ON A FARM OR IN THE COUNTRY 2. IN A SMALL TOWN (FEWER THAN 2,500 PEOPLE) 3. IN A TOWN (WITH BETWEEN 2,500 AND 25,000 PEOPLE) 4. IN A CITY (BETWEEN 25,000 AND 100,000 PEOPLE) 5. IN A LARGE CITY (MORE THAN 100,000 PEOPLE) 0. NO ANSWER

S133B.Q11. WHAT BRANCH OF THE ARMY ARE YOU IN NO?  01. ENGINEERS 02. FIELD ARTILLERY 03. QUARTERMASTER CORPS 04. INFANTRY 05. MEDICAL DEPARTMENT 06. ARMORED COMMAND (TANKS) 07. SIGNAL CORPS 08. COAST ARTILLERY (ANTI-AIRCRAFT) 09. COAST ARTILLERY (SEACOAST) 10. AIR CORPS 11. TRANSPORTATION CORPS 12. ORDNANCE DEPARTMENT 13. CHEMICAL WARFARE SERVICE 14. MILITARY POLICE 15. OTHER (DEML, POSTAL, FINANCE, AGD, SPECIAL SERVICE, EXCHANGE SERVICE, ETC.) 16. ANY OTHER 00. NO ANSWER
S133B.Q12. IN GENERAL, WHAT SORT OF A TIME DO YOU HAVE IN THE ARM?  1. I HAVE A PRETTY GOOD TIME 2. IT'S ABOUT FIFTY-FIFTY 3. I HAVE A PRETTY ROTTEN TIME 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S133B.Q13. ARE YOU EVER WORRIED AND UPSE?  1. I AM HARDLY EVER WORRIED AND UPSET 2. I AM SOMETIMES WORRIED AND UPSET 3. I AM OFTEN WORRIED AND UPSET 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S133B.Q14. IN GENERAL, HOW WOULD YOU SAY YOU FEEL MOST OF THE TIME, IN GOOD SPIRITS OR IN LOW SPIRIT?  1. I AM USUALLY IN GOOD SPIRITS 2. I AM IN GOOD SPIRITS SOME OF THE TIME AND IN LOW SPIRITS SOME OF THE TIME 3. I AM USUALLY IN LOW SPIRITS 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S133B.Q15. DO YOU USUALLY FEEL THAT WHAT YOU ARE DOING IN THE ARMY IS WORTHWHILE OR NO?  1. I USUALLY FEEL IT IS WORTHWHILE 2. I USUALLY FEEL IT IS NOT WORTHWHILE 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
S133B.Q16. HOW INTERESTED ARE YOU IN YOUR ARMY JO?  1. VERY MUCH INTERESTED 2. A LITTLE BUT NOT MUCH 3. NOT INTERESTED AT ALL 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S133B.Q17. WOULD YOU CHANGE TO SOME OTHER ARMY JOB IF GIVEN A CHANC?  1. YES 2. NO 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
S133B.Q18. DO YOU FEEL THAT EVERYTHING POSSIBLE HAS BEEN DONE TO PLACE YOU IN THE ARMY JOB WHERE YOU BEST FI?  1. YES 2. NO 3. UNDECIDED 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S133B.Q19. ON THE WHOLE, DO YOU THINK THE ARMY IS GIVING YOU A CHANCE TO SHOW WHAT YOU CAN D?  1. A VERY GOOD CHANCE 2. A FAIRLY GOOD CHANCE 3. NOT MUCH OF A CHANCE 4. NO CHANCE AT ALL 5. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S133B.Q20. HOW SATISFIED ARE YOU ABOUT BEING IN YOUR PRESENT ARMY JOB INSTEAD OF SOME OTHER ARMY JO?  1. VERY SATISFIED 2. SATISFIED 3. VERY DISSATISFIED 4. DISSATISFIED 5. IT DOES NOT MAKE ANY DIFFERENCE TO ME 0. NO ANSWER
S133B.Q21. IF IT WERE UP TO YOU TO CHOOSE, DO YOU THINK YOU COULD DO MORE FOR YOUR COUNTRY AS A SOLDIER OR AS A WORKER IN A WAR JO?  1. AS A SOLDIER 2. AS A WAR WORKER 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S133B.Q22. IF IT WERE UP TO YOU, WHAT KIND OF OUTFIT WOULD YOU RATHER BE I?  1. IN A COMBAT OUTFIT OVERSEAS 2. IN A NON-COMBAT OUTFIT OVERSEAS 3. IN AN OUTFIT THAT WOULD STAY IN THE UNITED STATES 0. NO ANSWER

S133B.Q23. ON THE LIST BELOW, CHECK ALL THE KINDS OF QUARTERS YOU HAVE LIVED IN AT ANY TIME SINCE YOU HAVE BEEN IN ALASKA:  1. QUONSET HUT OR PACIFIC HUT 2. YAKUTAT HUT, "KNOCKDOWN" ("K.D."), OR STOUT HOUSE 3. BARRACKS 4. TENT (ANY KIND) 5. SOME OTHER KIND OF QUARTERS 6. COMBINATION 1 AND 2 BOTH CHECKED, WITH OR WITHOUT ANYTHING ELSE CHECKED 7. ANY COMBINATION OF 3, 4 AND 5 CHECKED 0. NO ANSWER

S133B.Q24. WHAT KIND OF QUARTERS ARE YOU NOW LIVING I?  1. QUONSET HUT OR PACIFIC HUT 2. YAKUTAT HUT, "KNOCKDOWN" ("K.D."), OR STOUT HOUSE 3. BARRACKS 4. TENT (ANY KIND) 5. SOME OTHER KIND OF QUARTERS 0. NO ANSWER

S133B.Q25. IF YOU COULD LIVE IN EITHER (1) A QUONSET HUT OR PACIFIC HUT, OR (2) A YAKUTAT HUT, "KNOCKDOWN" ("K.D."), OR STOUT HOUSE, BUT HAD TO LIVE IN ONE OR THE OTHER KIND, WHICH WOULD YOU TAK?  1. QUONSET HUT OR PACIFIC HUT 2. YAKUTAT, "KNOCKDOWN" ("K.D."), OR STOUT HOUSE 3. MAKES NO DIFFERENCE 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S133B.Q26. IN GENERAL, HOW DO YOU LIKE THE ARCTIC CLOTHING AND EQUIPMENT YOU HAVE BEEN ISSUE?  1. IT IS VERY GOOD 2. IT IS PRETTY GOOD 3. IT IS NOT SO GOOD 4. IT IS NOT GOOD AT ALL 5. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S133B.Q30. HOW DO YOU FEEL ABOUT THE FOOD YOU HAVE BEEN GETTING AT THIS POS?  1. IT IS GOOD QUALITY AND WELL PREPARED 2. IT IS GOOD QUALITY, BUT POORLY PREPARED 3. IT IS POOR QUALITY, BUT WELL PREPARED 4. IT IS POOR QUALITY AND POORLY PREPARED 5. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTIONS 31 AND 32 NOT CODED.

S133B.Q33. SUPPOSE THE JAPANESE WERE TO INVADE ALASKA OR START BOMBING ARMY POSTS IN ALASKA AGAIN. DO YOU FEEL THAT YOU HAVE HAD ENOUGH TRAINING ON HOW TO PROTECT YOURSEL?  1. I AM SURE I HAVE 2. I THINK SO BUT I'M NOT SURE 3. I DON'T THINK I HAVE 4. UNDECIDED 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S133B.Q34. DO YOU FEEL THAT YOU AND THE OTHER MEN IN YOUR OUTFIT NEED MORE TRAINING IN HOW TO PROTECT YOURSELVES, LESS OF IT, OR ABOUT THE SAME AMOUNT AS YOU ARE NOW GETTIN?  1. WE NEED MORE TRAINING ON HOW TO PROTECT OURSELVES 2. WE NEED ABOUT THE SAME AMOUNT AS WE ARE NOW GETTING 3. WE NEED LESS TRAINING ON HOW TO PROTECT OURSELVES 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S133B.Q35. WHAT KINDS OF TRAINING DO YOU THINK YOU AND THE OTHER MEN IN YOUR OUTFIT SHOULD HAVE MORE OF IN ORDER TO BE ABLE TO PROTECT YOURSELVES AGAINST ENEMY ATTAC?  1. SMALL ARMS FIRING, USE OF SMALL WEAPONS - PISTOL, RIFLE, TARGET PRACTICE, ETC. 2. NOT CHOSEN

S133B.Q35. WHAT KINDS OF TRAINING DO YOU THINK YOU AND THE OTHER MEN IN YOUR OUTFIT SHOULD HAVE MORE OF IN ORDER TO BE ABLE TO PROTECT YOURSELVES AGAINST ENEMY ATTAC?  170 1. GUNNERY AND FIRING OF LARGER WEAPONS - MACHINE GUN, OUTFITS SPECIAL WEAPONS, ETC. 1849 2. NOT CHOSEN

S133B.Q35. WHAT KINDS OF TRAINING DO YOU THINK YOU AND THE OTHER MEN IN YOUR OUTFIT SHOULD HAVE MORE OF IN ORDER TO BE ABLE TO PROTECT YOURSELVES AGAINST ENEMY ATTAC?  225 1. DEFENSE AGAINST AIR ATTACK - IDENTIFICATION OF PLANES, CAMOUFLAGE AND CONCEALMENT, COVER, DISPERSING, HANDLING BOMBS, ETC. 1794 2. NOT CHOSEN

S133B.Q35. WHAT KINDS OF TRAINING DO YOU THINK YOU AND THE OTHER MEN IN YOUR OUTFIT SHOULD HAVE MORE OF IN ORDER TO BE ABLE TO PROTECT YOURSELVES AGAINST ENEMY ATTAC?  299 1. INDIVIDUAL HAND-TO-HAND COMBAT - RANGER, PHYSICAL TRAINING, COMMANDO TRAINING (EXCEPT WHERE EMPHASIS ON LARGE GROUP TRAINING) JUI-JITSU, PHYSICAL TOUGHENING, BAYONET PRACTICE, KNIVES, BOOBY TRAPS, GRENADES, ETC. 1720 2. NOT CHOSEN

S133B.Q35. WHAT KINDS OF TRAINING DO YOU THINK YOU AND THE OTHER MEN IN YOUR OUTFIT SHOULD HAVE MORE OF IN ORDER TO BE ABLE TO PROTECT YOURSELVES AGAINST ENEMY ATTAC?  218 1. UNIT COMBAT TRAINING - TRAINING UNDER LIVE AMMUNITION, EXPOSURE TO FIRE, MANEUVERS, ETC., COMBAT TRAINING IN GENERAL 1801 2. NOT CHOSEN CARD 2

S133B.Q36. HOW MANY YEARS WAS IT BETWEEN THE TIME YOU LEFT FULL-TIME SCHOOL AND THE TIME YOU CAME INTO THE ARM?  1. 1 YEAR OR LESS 2. OVER 1 YEAR UP TO 2 YEARS 3. OVER 2 YEARS UP TO 3 YEARS 4. OVER 3 YEARS UP TO 4 YEARS 5. OVER 4 YEARS UP TO 5 YEARS 6. OVER 5 YEARS 7. I CAME INTO THE ARMY RIGHT OUT OF SCHOOL 0. NO ANSWER

S133B.Q37A. IF YOU COULD DO WHAT YOU WANTED, WOULD YOU LIKE TO GO BACK TO FULL-TIME SCHOOL OR COLLEGE AFTER THE WA?  1. YES 2. NO 3. UNDECIDED 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA X. QUESTION 37B NOT CODED.

S133B.Q38A. REGARDLESS OF WHAT YOU WANT TO DO, DO YOU THINK YOU WILL ACTUALLY GO BACK TO FULL-TIME SCHOOL OR COLLEGE AFTER THE WA?  1. YES 2. NO 3. UNDECIDED 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA X. QUESTION 38B NOT CODED.

S133B.Q39A. DO YOU THINK YOU WOULD GO BACK TO FULL-TIME SCHOOL OR COLLEGE AFTER THE WAR IF THE FEDERAL GOVERNMENT OR YOUR STATE GOVERNMENT WERE WILLING TO HELP PAY YOUR WA?  1. I WILL GO BACK IF THE FEDERAL OR STATE GOVERNMENT HELPS ME 2. I WILL NOT GO BACK, EVEN IF THE FEDERAL OR STATE GOVERNMENT WOULD HELP ME 3. I EXPECT TO GO BACK TO SCHOOL WHETHER OR NOT THE FEDERAL OR STATE GOVERNMENT HELPS ME 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 39B NOT CODED.

S133B.Q40. IF YOU WERE OFFERED A GOOD JOB AT THE END OF THE WAR, DO YOU THINK YOU WOULD TURN IT DOWN AND GO BACK TO FULL-TIME SCHOOL OR COLLEGE, OR DO YOU THINK YOU WOULD TAKE THE JO?  1. I WOULD TURN THE JOB DOWN AND GO BACK TO SCHOOL 2. IF I COULD GET SOME HELP, I WOULD TURN THE JOB DOWN AND GO BACK TO SCHOOL 3. I WOULD TAKE THE JOB AND NOT GO BACK TO SCHOOL 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S133B.Q41. IF YOU COULD GET SOME KIND OF JOB AFTER THE WAR, BUT COULD NOT GET A GOOD JOB, DO YOU THINK YOU WOULD TURN IT DOWN AND GO BACK TO FULL-TIME SCHOOL OR COLLEGE, OR DO YOU THINK YOU WOULD TAKE THE JO?  1. I WOULD TURN THE JOB DOWN AND GO BACK TO SCHOOL 2. IF I COULD GET SOME HELP, I WOULD TURN THE JOB DOWN AND GO BACK TO SCHOOL 3. I WOULD TAKE THE JOB AND NOT GO BACK TO SCHOOL 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S133B.Q42. IF YOU COULDN'T GET ANY JOB AT ALL AFTER THE WAR, DO YOU THINK YOU WOULD GO BACK TO FULL-TIME SCHOOL OR COLLEG?  1. I WOULD GO BACK TO SCHOOL 2. IF I COULD GET SOME HELP, I WOULD GO BACK TO SCHOOL 3. I WOULD NOT GO BACK TO SCHOOL 4. UNDECIDED 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S133B.Q43. IF YOU COULD DO WHAT YOU WANTED, WHICH WOULD YOU RATHER DO AFTER THE WAR - GO TO FULL-TIME SCHOOL OR COLLEGE, OR GO TO PART-TIME SCHOOL OR COLLEG?  1. I WOULD LIKE TO GO TO FULL-TIME SCHOOL 2. I WOULD LIKE TO GO TO PART-TIME SCHOOL 3. I WOULD NOT LIKE TO GO TO SCHOOL OR COLLEGE AT ALL AFTER THE WAR 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S133B.Q44. HAVE YOU EVER THOUGHT THAT YOU MIGHT LIKE TO COME BACK AND SETTLE SOMEWHERE IN ALASKA AFTER THE WA?  1. YES, I HAVE OFTEN THOUGHT THAT I MIGHT 2. NOW AND THEN I HAVE THOUGHT I MIGHT 3. NO, I HAVE NEVER THOUGHT THAT I MIGHT 4. MY HOME IS IN ALASKA ALREADY 0. NO ANSWER

S133B.Q45. REGARDLESS OF WHAT YOU WANT TO DO, DO YOU THINK YOU REALLY WILL SETTLE OR STAY IN ALASKA AFTER THE WA?  1. YES, I AM SURE I WILL 2. I MIGHT BUT I AM NOT SURE 3. NO, I AM SURE I WON'T 4. HAVE NO IDEA 0. NO ANSWER

S133B.Q46. IF YOU COULD GET A BETTER JOB OR MAKE MORE MONEY IN ALASKA THAN YOU COULD MAKE IN THE STATES, DO YOU THINK YOU WOULD SETTLE IN ALASKA AFTER THE WA?  1. YES, I WOULD IF I COULD GET A BETTER JOB IN ALASKA 2. NO, I WOULDN'T EVEN IF I COULD GET A BETTER JOB IN ALASKA 3. I PLAN TO SETTLE IN ALASKA WHETHER I CAN GET A BETTER JOB OR NOT 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S133B.Q47. IF THE GOVERNMENT WERE TO OFFER GOOD LAND IN ALASKA FREE TO SOLDIERS WHO WANTED TO SETTLE THERE, DO YOU THINK YOU WOULD TAKE UP THE OFFE?  1. YES, I AM SURE I WOULD 2. YES, IF I COULD GET ENOUGH MONEY TO GET STARTED ON 3. I MIGHT, BUT I AM NOT SURE 4. NO, I AM NOT INTERESTED IN LAND IN ALASKA 5. HAVE NO IDEA 0. NO ANSWER

S133B.Q48. WOULD YOU LIKE TO KNOW MORE NOW ABOUT THE OPPORTUNITIES THERE WILL BE IN ALASKA AFTER THE WA?  1. YES, I WOULD LIKE TO KNOW MORE ABOUT THESE OPPORTUNITIES 2. I THINK I ALREADY KNOW ENOUGH ABOUT THESE OPPORTUNITIES 3. NO, I AM NOT INTERESTED IN OPPORTUNITIES IN ALASKA 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
S133B.Q49. WHAT KIND OF OPPORTUNITIES IN ALASKA ARE YOU MOST INTERESTED IN KNOWING MORE ABOU?  1. HOMESTEADING OR GETTING FREE LAND TO SETTLE 2. NOT CHOSEN

S133B.V109. LOCATION AND CAMP IDENTIFICATION: E. TEN INSTALLATIONS WERE VISITED AND 90 UNITS WERE SAMPLED. POSTS WITH LESS THAN 500 TROOPS WERE EXCLUDED AS WERE THOSE IN SOUTHEASTERN ALASKA WHERE LESS THAN 5% OF THE TOTAL TROOP STRENGTH WAS LOCATED. NONE OF THE ALEUTIAN POSTS SAMPLED WAS ADJACENT TO ANY KIND OF CIVILIAN COMMUNITY AND NONE HAD ANY WOMEN OTHER THAN A HANDFUL OF NURSES.  01. MAINLAND - FT. GREELEY (A FAIRLY LARGE POST WITH KODIAK, A SMALL CIVILIAN COMMUNITY ADJACENT.) 02. MAINLAND - NOME (A SMALL FAR-NORTH POST. THIS WAS A SMALL CIVILIAN COMMUNITY.) 03. MAINLAND - FAIRBANKS (A FAIRLY LARGE NORTHERN POST, PRINCIPALLY AN AIR BASE. THE ONLY TROOPS THERE WHO WERE ALASKAN DEPARTMENT JURISDICTION WERE INFANTRY AND A FEW SERVICE TROOPS.) 04. MAINLAND - FT. RICHARDSON (A LARGE GARRISON TYPE POST ADJACENT TO ANCHORAGE, A SIZEABLE CIVILIAN COMMUNITY.) 05. MAINLAND - WHITTIER (A SMALL POST, PRINCIPALLY PORT ACTIVITIES. NO CIVILIAN COMMUNITY ADJACENT, BUT ONE COULD BE VISITED ON A THREE-DAY PASS.) 06. ALEUTIANS - ADAK (A LARGE, WELL ESTABLISHED POST.) 07. ALEUTIANS - ATTU (A LARGE, SOMEWHAT NEWER POST.) 08. ALEUTIANS - FT. GLENN, SUBPOST (A SMALL POST WITH PRINCIPALLY PORT ACTIVITIES. REACHED BY A TWO-HOUR BOAT TRIP FROM UMNAK.) 09. ALEUTIANS - FT. GLENN, UMNAK (ONE OF THE OLDEST ALEUTIANS POSTS, FAIRLY LARGE AND WELL ESTABLISHED.) 10. ALEUTIANS - SHUMYA (A RELATIVELY SMALL AND NEW POST WITH PRINCIPALLY AIR CORPS ACTIVITIES.)
